tweet: We are all praying for our friend John as he fights cancer. If there is someone who won’t back down from a fight, it’s @repjohnlewis.

After a fight with Alzheimer's, Richard Lutz passed away. Today, his wife Barbara hears from friends when they find out someone they love gets diagnosed. They reach out saying, what do I do?

Barbara told me, "All I can tell them is to pray for a cure." 

HR 3 means #FewerCures pic.twitter.com/SQXnzRHfaR

.@RepMeuser is right. Pelosi's partisan plan is not only bad policy, it's dead on arrival in the Senate. 

The Lower Costs, More Cures Act instead contains bipartisan solutions that can actually become law. https://twitter.com/RepMeuser/status/1204822472715046913 …

But we have a solution - the Lower Costs, More Cures Act is a bipartisan plan that will lower the costs of prescription drugs while protecting access to new, innovative medications and cures -->  https://www.gop.gov/morecures/ . Let's get this across the finish line for patients.

HR 3, the partisan Pelosi drug pricing plan, could lead to as many as 100 fewer drugs entering the US market over the next decade. This could be a cure for ALS, Alzheimer's, pediatric cancer...anything. 

Even one less cure is too many. https://www.whitehouse.gov/articles/house-drug-pricing-bill-keep-100-lifesaving-drugs-american-patients/ …
